entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, left alone in a dark room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who helps him out of the situation.

entities.name: mirror
entities.description: A cracked and age-spotted mirror hanging on the wall.

entities.name: skull-like face
entities.description: A description of a face that Harry sees in the mirror.

relationships.description: Harry moves towards the mirror and sees his reflection.
Ron helps Harry out of the situation by getting him out of the hangings.
